item.title: Cardano Stake Launch - BosPool
item.description: Stake like a Boss! Zero Margin and minimum fees mean more return for you! TICKER: BOS CARDANO Cardano is a blockchain platform designed and built by Charles Hoskinson and his talented team at IOHK. Cardano and the supported native cryptocurrency ADA were designed to be secure, scalable and robust enough to support foundational change. [BOS] stake pool ID: 19baf409a231aa295a81fab2a7d72e9b2f3b8605acbad0e427f22368
